paragraphs: Claude Code is the official CLIShort for Command Line Interface. A program you use by typing commands with your keyboard instead of clicking with a mouse. tool that lets you use Anthropic's AI assistant Claude in the terminalThe black screen on your computer where you type commands. Called Terminal on Mac and Command Prompt on Windows.. You can get AI help throughout the entire development process, from writing code to debuggingThe process of finding and fixing errors (bugs) in a program. and refactoringThe process of reorganizing working code to make it cleaner and more efficient..

Whether you're solving complex programming problems, learning new technologies, or improving existing code, Claude helps you in real-time. It's like having an experienced developer pair programmingA method where two people write code together on one computer. One person writes code while the other reviews, helping each other develop. with you.

tip.title: Simply put
tip.content: Claude Code lets you chat with AI like texting a friend, but instead of sending memes, you're building cool stuff! Just ask "How do I build this?" and Claude creates the code and explains everything in simple terms.

tooltips.terminal: The black screen on your computer where you type commands. Called Terminal on Mac and Command Prompt on Windows.
tooltips.cli: Short for Command Line Interface. A program you use by typing commands with your keyboard instead of clicking with a mouse.
tooltips.debugging: The process of finding and fixing errors (bugs) in a program.
tooltips.refactoring: The process of reorganizing working code to make it cleaner and more efficient.
tooltips.pair_programming: A method where two people write code together on one computer. One person writes code while the other reviews, helping each other develop.

cards.title: Natural Language Coding
cards.description: Describe your requirements in plain English, and Claude will understand and implement the code. You can make requests like "Make this function more efficient" or "Add error handling here."

example.label: Example
example.content: "Build a user login page" ‚Üí AI generates HTML, CSS, JavaScript code

cards.title: Smart Debugging
cards.description: When something breaks (and trust us, it happens to everyone!), just copy and paste the error message. Claude will explain what went wrong in plain English and tell you exactly how to fix it.

example.label: How it works
example.content: Say "My code isn't working" and show the error screen. Claude will explain the issue and provide a solution.

cards.title: Automated Documentation
cards.description: Don't know how to explain your code to others? No problem! Claude automatically writes clear explanations and instructions that anyone can follow.

cards.title: Code Review & Improvement
cards.description: Claude looks at your code and suggests ways to make it better. It knows all the best practicesThe most proven good coding methods that work well so you don't have to worry about doing things the "wrong" way.

cards.title: Refactoring Assistant
cards.description: Got some old messy codeCode that works but could be organized better? Claude can clean it up and make it easier to understand and work with.

cards.title: Test Code Generation
cards.description: Claude creates automatic testsPrograms that check if your code works correctly to make sure your code works properly. It even thinks of weird scenariosUnusual situations that might break your code you might not have considered.

questions.question: Can I use it without knowing how to code at all?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Don't worry if you've never coded before - Claude Code is your friendly coding buddy. Just tell Claude what you want in everyday language like "I need a website for my business" or "Help me organize my Excel data." Claude will create everything you need and explain each step like you're chatting with a helpful friend.

questions.question: Is Claude Code free?
questions.answer: To use Claude Code, you need a Claude Pro plan subscription ($20/month) or higher. You cannot use Claude Code with the free plan.

pricing.label: Subscription Plans
plans: Pro Plan ($20/month) - Suitable for small projects
Max Plan ($100+/month) - Suitable for large projects

questions.question: How long does installation take?
questions.answer: Don't stress about setup! Most people get everything running in 20-30 minutes. We'll walk you through every single step with screenshots, and if something goes wrong, we've got your back with easy fixes for common hiccups.

questions.question: What programming languages are supported?
questions.answer: Claude speaks every coding language fluently! Whether it's Python, JavaScript, Java, or dozens of others - Claude has got you covered. Think of Claude as your multilingual coding assistant who never gets tired of translating your ideas into working code.
questions.tip: New to coding? Start with HTML/CSS/JavaScript for websites (super visual and fun!), or Python for automating boring tasks

questions.question: Do I need an internet connection?
questions.answer: Yes, you'll need internet since Claude lives in the cloud and helps you in real-time. Think of it like texting a super-smart friend who happens to be amazing at coding!

questions.question: Is my code safe?
questions.answer: Your code is safe with Claude! Anthropic (Claude's creator) treats your projects like private diary entries - they're never used to train other AI models and are protected with top-level security. Your creative work stays yours.
